alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 5:42PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Itasca, southeastern Koochiching and west central St. Louis Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Nett Lake, to 13 miles northwest of Togo, to 9 miles northwest of Effie, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Itasca, southeastern Koochiching and west central St. Louis Counties, including the following locations... Celina, Greaney, Bois Forte Band Deer Creek Area, Craigville and Bois Forte Band Nett Lake Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis
